headline: ServiceNow Earnings: AI Fuels Momentum
summary: ServiceNow easily beat analyst expectations for the second quarter.  AI products are driving growth, and management sees agentic AI as a key growth driver.  ServiceNow handily beat analyst expectations in the second quarter, with revenue growth of 22.5% and adjusted EPS growth of 31%.

raw.headline: ServiceNow Earnings: AI Fuels Momentum
raw.summary: ServiceNow easily beat analyst expectations for the second quarter.  AI products are driving growth, and management sees agentic AI as a key growth driver.  ServiceNow handily beat analyst expectations in the second quarter, with revenue growth of 22.5% and adjusted EPS growth of 31%.

headline: ServiceNow stock jumps on Q2 earnings beat: CEO talks AI boom
summary: Shares of ServiceNow (NOW) are soaring in after-hours trading Wednesday after posting second quarter results that topped Wall Street estimates on both the top and bottom lines. Chairman and CEO Bill McDermott talks to Yahoo Finance Executive Editor Brian Sozzi about the quarter and how the company is benefiting from the AI craze. For more expert insight and the latest market action, click here.

headline: ServiceNow (NYSE:NOW) Surprises With Q2 Sales, Stock Soars
summary: Enterprise workflow software maker ServiceNow (NYSE:NOW) reported Q2 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 22.4% year on year to $3.22 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $4.09 per share was 14.6% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

raw.headline: ServiceNow (NYSE:NOW) Surprises With Q2 Sales, Stock Soars
raw.summary: Enterprise workflow software maker ServiceNow (NYSE:NOW) reported Q2 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 22.4% year on year to $3.22 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $4.09 per share was 14.6% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: ServiceNow Reports Earnings. Second Quarter Was ‘Spectacular,’ Says CFO.
summary: ServiceNow  stock soared after the company reported better-than-expected financial results and raised its full-year subscription revenue guidance as demand for its artificial-intelligence-powered enterprise software remains strong.  ServiceNow  posted second-quarter adjusted earnings of $4.09 a share on revenue of $3.22 billion.  Second-quarter subscription revenue of $3.11 billion rose 23% from the same period last year and beat analyst estimates of $3.03 billion.

raw.headline: ServiceNow Reports Earnings. Second Quarter Was ‘Spectacular,’ Says CFO.

ServiceNow  posted second-quarter adjusted earnings of $4.09 a share on revenue of $3.22 billion.  Second-quarter subscription revenue of $3.11 billion rose 23% from the same period last year and beat analyst estimates of $3.03 billion.

headline: ServiceNow raises annual subscription revenue forecast on AI-driven tools demand
summary: (Reuters) -ServiceNow raised its annual subscription revenue forecast on Wednesday, signaling robust demand for its artificial intelligence-enabled software designed to automate digital operations and sending its shares up more than 7% in extended trading.  Businesses are widely adopting cloud-based enterprise solutions from vendors including ServiceNow, Salesforce and Freshworks to streamline operations and boost productivity amid the ongoing AI boom.  ServiceNow projected its third-quarter subscription revenue above Wall Street estimates, despite economic uncertainty due to changing U.S. trade policies and Trump administration's cost-cutting measures that led to contract cancellations and delays.

raw.headline: ServiceNow raises annual subscription revenue forecast on AI-driven tools demand

ServiceNow projected its third-quarter subscription revenue above Wall Street estimates, despite economic uncertainty due to changing U.S. trade policies and Trump administration's cost-cutting measures that led to contract cancellations and delays.

headline: ServiceNow Reports Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: SANTA CLARA, Calif., July 23, 2025--ServiceNow (NYSE: NOW), the AI platform for business transformation, today announced financial results for its second quarter ended June 30, 2025, with subscription revenues of $3,113 million in Q2 2025, representing 22.5% year-over-year growth and 21.5% in constant currency.

raw.headline: ServiceNow Reports Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results
raw.summary: SANTA CLARA, Calif., July 23, 2025--ServiceNow (NYSE: NOW), the AI platform for business transformation, today announced financial results for its second quarter ended June 30, 2025, with subscription revenues of $3,113 million in Q2 2025, representing 22.5% year-over-year growth and 21.5% in constant currency.

headline: ServiceNow and CapZone Announce a Strategic Partnership to Build a National Network of Next Generation Digital Solutions for Mission-Critical Manufacturing Facilities
summary: NORWALK, Conn. & SANTA CLARA, Calif., July 23, 2025--ServiceNow (NYSE: NOW) today announced a strategic partnership with CapZone Impact Investments LLC, a leading Opportunity Zone investment management company, to develop a national network of next generation digital solutions for mission-critical manufacturing facilities, starting in Mobile, Alabama.
